entries.new_reward: You are eligible for the %DI day veteran reward! Use the /claimVeteranReward command to get your reward.
entries.select_reward: Select your reward from the list. Rewards followed by "*" may not be gained more than once. Rewards followed by "#" may not be traded or sold.
entries.greeting: Hi there! Come for your reward?
entries.go_away: You need more time under your belt to get a reward.
entries.time_active: Player %TT has %DI days logged for veteran rewards.
entries.self_time_active: You have %DI days logged for veteran rewards.
entries.system_inactive: The veteran system is not active.
entries.not_eligible: You are not currently eligible for a veteran reward.
entries.reward_given: Your reward has been placed in your inventory.
entries.reward_error: The reward could not be granted.
entries.invalid_target: That target is invalid for veteran rewards.
entries.has_milestone: The player has received the milestone's reward.
entries.has_not_milestone: The player has not received the milestone's reward.
entries.active_months_cleared: Your active time has been reset.
entries.select_milestone: Select which milestone you would like to get a reward for.
entries.bad_milestone: You have selected an invalid milestone.
entries.new_reward_msgbox: You are eligible for a new veteran reward! Use the /claimVeteranReward command to get your reward.
entries.harvester_converted: Your harvester %TT has been converted to use 0 power.
entries.one_year_inventory_full: We tried to give you a reward in celebration of Star Wars Galaxies' one-year anniversary, but your inventory is full. Please create at least one unit of free space in your inventory, log out for five minutes or more, and log back in again.
entries.one_year_anniversary_from: Star Wars Galaxies One Year Anniversary
entries.one_year_anniversary: Star Wars Galaxies is one year old! To celebrate, we've given you a special gift you can put in your home or guild hall. Check your inventory.
entries.flash_speeder_granted_body: You have received a deed for the Flash Speeder as your reward for pre-ordering Jump to Lightspeed.  If you should ever need a replacement, simply type /flashspeeder to purchase another for 20,000 credits.
entries.flash_speeder_replace_prompt: A replacement Flash Speeder is available at the cost of 20000 credits.  Are you sure you want a new speeder?
entries.flash_speeder_not_eligible: You are not eligible to receive a Flash Speeder.
entries.flash_speeder_no_inv_space: You do not have any inventory space remaining for the Flash Speeder deed.
entries.flash_speeder_granted: A Flash Speeder deed has been placed in your inventory.
entries.flash_speeder_grant_failed: Flash Speeder deed grant has failed.  This could be the result of being ineligible or not having enough credits to pay for the replacement fee.
entries.flash_speeder_no_credits: You do not have enough credits to receive a replacement.
entries.select_reward_confirm: The reward rank and milestone number do not match.  You have selected a lower ranking reward for this milestone.  Are you sure you want to select this lower rank reward for this milestone?
entries.bad_reward: You have selected an invalid reward.
entries.confirm_choose_type: Please confirm that you would like to select this resource as your Veteran Reward Crate of Resources.  Use the BACK button to go back and select a different resource.
entries.harvester_already_selfpowered: That harvester is already self-powered.  Choose a different harvester.
entries.sui_respec_prompt: Using this item will permanently lower this character's respec cost by 50%.  This will apply to all future respecs.  Apply respec reduction now?
entries.msg_respec_used: Congratulations! All future respecs for this character will be half off the normal rate.
entries.have_yacht: You already have a Sorosuub Yacht control device stored in your datapad.
entries.harvester_cant_self_power_elite: You cannot self power an elite harvester with this deed.
entries.harvester_cant_self_power_normal: You cannot self power a normal harvester with an elite deed.
entries.deed_converted: You have converted three normal deeds into one elite deed.
entries.resource_deed_confirmation_prompt: Are you certain that this is the resource that you want? Confirming this selection will grant you a crate of your chosen resource and consume the deed.
